attributes.action: follow the advice issued by it's own scientists and allow the proposed badger cull to prevent bovine TB
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prime Minister, Please allow the proposed cull of badgers to go ahead. I am aware that badgers are a cute and attractive animals and that the policy would be unpopular with many urban voters, as Mr Benn alluded to. However 1000s of cattle are slaughtered every year as a result of Bovine TB. Surely  the public acceptance of a policy must come in second place to the real good of the country? Rural and farming comunities feel besieged enough.

rejection.details:
A big investment in vaccines to tackle Bovine TB was announced today as Government policy is that licences should not be issued to allow badger culling. 

http://www.defra.gov.uk/news/latest/2008/animal-0707.htm
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
